[00:00.64]Get You (第60届格莱美最佳R&B表演提名歌曲) - Daniel Caesar/Kali Uchis
[00:01.64]Daniel Caesar：
[00:02.32]
[00:19.02]Through drought and famine natural disasters
[00:25.05]
[00:25.58]My baby has been around for me
[00:31.37]
[00:32.04]Kingdoms have fallen angels be calling
[00:38.49]None of that could ever make me leave
[00:45.71]
[00:46.62]Every time I look into your eyes I see it
[00:53.20]
[00:54.40]You're all I need
[00:57.52]
[00:59.59]Every time I get a bit inside I feel it
[01:05.99]

[01:49.05]

[01:52.38]
